About Us

An upscale destination in Dubai, UAE offering a complete range of services for the purpose of improving health, beauty and relaxation through personal care treatments. From Manicure & Pedicure stations to a full-fledged Nailbar.

It also has services on hair such as cutting, styling and coloring, a Make-up Section and Spa Services that offer ultra-chic, ultra-comfortable treatment rooms with the finest spa linens and equipment. The Spa offers massages in a variety of styles – traditional Swedish Massage, Deep Tissue work, Hot Stone Massage, Reflexology, Thai etc.

Unrivaled Expertise

A nail makeover with the most creative nail technicians in Dubai! With skills masterfully perfected over the years of professional work.

A Unique Destination

Your chosen style & our techniques creates an unlimited possibilities that ensures a beautiful and unique results for you &
